price: 14. (Waxaa la odhan): Ha u yeedhannina maanta halaag keliya, ee u yeedha halaag badan5.
arabic: لَّا تَدۡعُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ ثُبُورٗا وَٰحِدٗا وَٱدۡعُواْ ثُبُورٗا كَثِيرٗا
footnotes: 5. Thubuuraa waa weedh ay Carabta odhan jireen markay la kulmaan cadow ka xoog badan ama ku dhacdo musiibo weyn, macnaheeduna waxaa weeye Allow naga soo gaadh oo na badbaadi ama nafta naga qaad.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: lā tadʿū al-yawma thubūran wāḥidan wa-id'ʿū thubūran kathīran
